info.name: deviantART: tiny birthdays (rotane)
info.description: Based on Kath602's idea ( http://fav.me/d3exela ) to make the Birthday notification in deviantART's message centre smaller.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1 - initial release.
v0.2 - some bugfixes.
v0.3 - it had stopped working, since dA changed the URL from the MC.
